title: My Match Vanished Without A trace (wtf is this update fix ur spaghetti)
body: I just got done playing a match that was in about the 40 min mark when all of a sudden everything crashed, my game froze and I received an "Attempting to reconnect" pop up as if I'd lost connection to the match but my internet was still up and running fine, I was communicating with a friend through discord so I for sure know it wasnt an internet issue, so I hit escape and exited game to try and reconnect and see if that was the problem. Once I'd left, no reconnect option came up like normal so i checked my recent games and the match doesnt even exist, like its not there at all. Its just gone.

replies.body: Was this recent or overnight?  There was a patch a few hours ago, so things might have still be coming back up.  If this is still happening, your best bet would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Even though your internet seems to be running fine, you can still have issues reaching specific services- in this case the game server.  Hope this helps!

This happened about 5 minutes before I made my post, however i just logged on to find that my match is now in my recent games, as a loss :( That or taking a tempban for leaving was what i feared most.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=yWBhHtFr,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-05-03T17:08:18.518+0000)
>
> Was this recent or overnight?  There was a patch a few hours ago, so things might have still be coming back up.  If this is still happening, your best bet would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Even though your internet seems to be running fine, you can still have issues reaching specific services- in this case the game server.  Hope this helps!

This is still happening to others, I have not had it happen to me since this morning around 9-10am est.

I had the same thiing twice . i was plying normal game with 4 people on skype and sudenly all of us popped attempting to reconnect. then we exit to reconnect manually and no game was existing  at all. i post it as a bug a couple of minutes ago

Hi, this just happened to me, I was kicked and then it crashed. I don't know if the game I was in ended, I tried to reconnect but there was not even a match record, so my guess is that the game is running? but now I am on another game :I

Edit: the match never appeared. Another thing that was weird in the vanished match, is that when I used tab for checking on people's builds, it only showed the first teammate on the list but the rest was empty. I don't know that it has anything to do with the problem though.

dude same thing just happened to me, I'm sitting here wondering if I'm gonna get leaver bustered or something cause I left the game after sitting at that reconnect screen for 3 mins without reconnecting, to try to reconnect manually, but there wasn't anything for me to try to reconnect to.
